'''''Pudgy Pyrotechnicians''''' is a repeatable [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Mondstadt]] and [[Liyue]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Hilichurls are manufacturing exploding barrels in the wilderness. Stop them!}}
# Defeat all enemies

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}
